exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce UnitalSeparationAlgebra to an evaluable reference.
Cannot coerce ResidualSeparationAlgebra to an evaluable reference.

original: unfold UnitalSeparationAlgebra, SeparationAlgebra. intros. unfold ResidualSeparationAlgebra. split. - intros n. destruct (incr_exists n) as [m [Hres Hincrease]]. exists m. split. + apply Hres. + apply Hincrease. - intros n. destruct (residue_exists n) as [m Hres]. exists m. apply Hres.
